arts.ttl: NAPOLI vs. INTER: THE TRUE TEST OF THE SEASON
arts.sum: At the Maradona, two giants level on points face off: Napoli look to redeem themselves, while Inter hope to extend their dominance after seven consecutive wins. The Maradona is ready to shine for the big match of Serie A Enilive Matchday 8: Napoli and Inter arrive level on points, but with very different moods.
